title: SEC Approves First Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF, DigiToads (TOADS) and Cardano (ADA) Skyrocket
description: Amidst numerous back and forths, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has finally approved the first leveraged Bitcoin (BTC) ETF, Volatility Shares 2X Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITX). Although there are about six exchange-traded funds (ETFs) that allow investment in Bitcoin (BTC) futures contracts, the first leveraged Bitcoin (BTC) futures ETF offers leveraged exposure [...]
